modName: Cloaks of Skyrim - Dawnguard patch fix by Xtudo
summary: This little patch fixes the missing normal maps to the Dawnguard capes added by the excellent Cloaks of Skyrim v1.2 mod.
descriptionHtml:
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Cloaks of Skyrim - Dawnguard patch fix

By Xtudo
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~


Description
===========

Fixes the missing normal maps to the Dawnguard capes (no more shinny capes).

For the excellent Cloaks of Skyrim v1.2 mod by Nikinoodles. (REQUIRED)


Installation
=============

1. You need the Cloaks of Skyrim - Dawnguard optional file v1.2 already installed.
    Here: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12092/?

2. Extract downloaded files, and copy them to your Skyrim/Data folder. Overwrite when asked.


Known Issues or Bugs
====================

- None :D


Contact
=======

I am as Xtudo at TESNexus / SkyrimNexus.


Tools Used
==========

NifSkope


Licensing/Legal
===============

- Many thanks to Nikinoodles for his awesome mod.
- Many thanks to Bethesda for making such a piece of art! I love you guys/gals! :D
author: Xtudo
